abstract.TEXT: Although there was only moderate linkage disequilibrium between rs2075650 and the ApoE Îµ4 defining SNP rs429358, we could not find an APOE-independent effect of rs2075650 on longevity, either in cross-sectional or in longitudinal analyses.

negation_scope.text: not find an APOE-independent effect of rs2075650 on longevity, either in cross-sectional or in longitudinal analyses.
